Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34069 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 3.0.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34069 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 3.0.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-werkzeug is earlier than 3.0.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-34069
